name: Christmas Fair (itch)
description:
It's three days until Christmas and it's looking like your friend Marcus stood you up at the annual Christmas fair. Sigh. Don't let that stop you from having a good time! Or at least, as much of a good time as you can. It's a small town, we try our best.

Made for the 2022 Cozy Winter game jam!

arrow keys to move

spacebar to interact
